segments.text: How would you describe your ideal job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the job should make use of the professional experience I have obtained , and offer me opportunity for advancement .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you think you might like to work for our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel my background and experience are a good fit for this position and I am very interested.What ' s more , your company is outstanding in this field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What makes you think you would be a success in this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My graduate school training combined with my experience as an intern should qualify me for this particular job . I am sure I will be successful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you know about this company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your company is very reputed in this city . I heard much praise to your company .
segments.speaker: S2
